title: Team Recruitment Oceania - Gold - Platinum Rating.
body:
Creating new team, looking for active players.
Requirements.
Able to play at least 5 days a week (2+ Games).
Gold Rating to Platinum Rating Players only.
Must have Skype as all players are connected there.
Must be able to play at least two roles.

Add Mikels

Name for team will be released soon.

We will be doing test match's and trials in the mean time add if you would like to join.

replies.body: Hi I am plat 5 on na and I have just recently been given this account by a friend it was bronze 5 said he couldn't be bothere with the account and said I could have it if I wanted apart from meeting the most crude people ever I have got it to silver 1 hoer vet I believe I can get it gold in the next few days an I'm a crazy vayne player :)
only problem i have is available from 11.30pm to 4 am nz time on weekdays but free all weekend. I can do 8am to 1pm practice but I also like to sleep in the mornings
I'm in. I'll carry you to bronze.
